page.title: 09Social Survey (part 2)
page.content: Every home has a television and radio. A little over half have video recorders. Refrigerators and freezers are owned by 90%. 75% of families have a car and 20% of these have two cars. Of those that have pets, 40% have dogs, 25% birds, 20% fish and 15% cats. Spennymoor has a number of facilities for the use of leisure. Children make good use of the Recreation Centre. 80% use it and 90% use the Leisure Pool. 41% use the library and 40% go to the Youth Club. A little over half the children have have been abroad, usually for holidays..
